Text:
Hello, not sure you'll ever get this message, but thanks for this.
This is the masterpiece follow-up to the ground breaking earth shattering "License to Ill." A very enjoyable thing to listen to. 
Will seed.

R.I.P.
Adam "MCA" Yauch
Beasties all day
thank u for not uploading this classic album in shitty quality like every other retard

Rest in peace, MCA

This is my favorite Beasties album, I remember the day I bought this on cassette. I have since bought the CD.....& still HAVE IT, lol. Just wanted to express my condolences. You will be missed.
